full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 771 Filed 08/10/22 Page 4 of 7 LCMCMAXT
1
The response is, "No, thank you." Asterisk, "Jurors have made plans for tomorrow."
2
3
So, we will get them what they've asked for as quickly as possible. And then, everyone, please be ready to go at
4
4:25. We'll bring them out for dismissal.
5
I had one quick additional point I wanted to make about the request yesterday for the question regarding Annie's
6
testimony and the request from the defense was to also put in the limiting instruction. I wanted to note that the limiting
7
instruction went in on the transcript of Annie's testimony, as well. So they did have that.
8
9
All right. Anything to address, Ms. Comey?
10
MS. COMEY: No, your Honor.
11
THE COURT: Ms. Sternheim?
12
MS. STERNHEIM: No, thank you.
13
THE COURT: We'll see everyone at 4:25 unless we hear anything further. As soon as you have the materials, give them
14
to Ms. Williams, please. Thank you.
15
(Recess)
16
THE COURT: Any matters to take up before we bring them to dismiss them?
17
MS. COMEY: No, your Honor.
18
MS. STERNHEIM: No, thank you.
19
THE COURT: Okay. Bring in the jury, please.
20
(Continued on next page)
21
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
22
(212) 805-0300
